```{r}
library("XML")
library(httr)

link = "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/S%26P_100"
doc <- readHTMLTable(rawToChar(GET(link)$content))

stock_table <- doc[[3]]
stock_table$Symbol <- as.character(stock_table$Symbol)
stock_table$Symbol[17] <-"BRK-B"

symbol_names <- stock_table$Symbol

```
